title: Fried Green Tomatoes at the Whistle Stop Cafe /Welcome to the World, Baby Girl!
description: From Personal Private Collection. Nov 2000 First Ballantine Edition. Paperback. Has light creases on spine, binding is good and tight, pages are clean and intact, Edge wear on cover. Bright colors on cover, No writing inside book. If you would like a pic just let me know.
author: Fannie Flagg
